 name: String,
 onNavigateBack: () -> Unit,
) {

 Text(
 text = "Hello $name!",

 colors = ButtonColors(
 contentColor = MaterialTheme.colorScheme.onPrimary,

 ),
 onClick = {
 onNavigateBack()
 }
 ) {
 Text(
 text = "Navigate Back",
 modifier = Modifier.padding(24.dp),
 color = MaterialTheme.colorScheme.onPrimary,
 style = MaterialTheme.typography.headlineMedium,
 )
 }
 }
}
